result.eng: The project will be finished in a year.
result.ga: Beidh an tionscadal críochnaithe i gceann bliana
result.orig: Beidh an tionscadal críochnaithe i gceann bliana
result.html: Beidh an tionscadal críochnaithe i gceann blianaThe project will be finished in a year.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an tionscadal críoċnaiṫe i gceann blianaThe project will be finished in a year.

result.eng: I was employed by an American company for five years.
result.ga: Bhí mé fostaithe ag comhlacht Meiriceánach ar feadh cúig bliana
result.orig: Bhí mé fostaithe ag comhlacht Meiriceánach ar feadh cúig bliana

result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé fostaiṫe ag coṁlaċt Meiriceánaċ ar feaḋ cúig blianaI was employed by an American company for five years.

result.eng: I spent three years over there.
result.ga: Chaith mé trí bliana thall ansin
result.orig: Chaith mé trí bliana thall ansin
result.html: Chaith mé trí bliana thall ansinI spent three years over there.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ mé trí bliana ṫall ansinI spent three years over there.

result.eng: The plan could be finished in six years.
result.ga: D'fhéadfadh an beart a bheith críochnaithe faoi cheann sé bliana
result.orig: D'fhéadfadh an beart a bheith críochnaithe faoi cheann sé bliana

result.ponchtml: D'ḟéadfaḋ an beart a ḃeiṫ críoċnaiṫe faoi ċeann sé blianaThe plan could be finished in six years.

result.eng: We do the same thing year after year.
result.ga: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh bliana
result.orig: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh bliana
result.html: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh blianaWe do the same thing year after year.
result.ponchtml: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaiḋ blianaWe do the same thing year after year.

result.eng: It will take at least six years.
result.ga: Glacfaidh sé sé bliana ar a laghad
result.orig: Glacfaidh sé sé bliana ar a laghad
result.html: Glacfaidh sé sé bliana ar a laghadIt will take at least six years.
result.ponchtml: Glacfaiḋ sé sé bliana ar a laġadIt will take at least six years.

result.eng: It will take another four years.
result.ga: Glacfaidh sé ceithre bliana eile
result.orig: Glacfaidh sé ceithre bliana eile
result.html: Glacfaidh sé ceithre bliana eileIt will take another four years.
result.ponchtml: Glacfaiḋ sé ceiṫre bliana eileIt will take another four years.

result.eng: Around the year 535 BC.
result.ga: I dtrátha na bliana 535 RC
result.orig: I dtrátha na bliana 535 RC
result.html: I dtrátha na bliana 535 RCAround the year 535 BC.
result.ponchtml: I dtráṫa na bliana 535 RCAround the year 535 BC.

result.eng: Many a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.
result.ga: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na bliana
result.orig: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na bliana

result.eng: He was set free after five years in prison.
result.ga: Scaoileadh saor é tar éis cúig bliana sa phríosún
result.orig: Scaoileadh saor é tar éis cúig bliana sa phríosún
result.html: Scaoileadh saor é tar éis cúig bliana sa phríosúnHe was set free after five years in prison.

result.eng: Thousands of people come year after year to take part in the festival.
result.ga: Tagann na mílte daoine bliain i ndiaidh bliana chun páirt a ghlacadh san fhéile

result.eng: It happened at the beginning of the year.
result.ga: Tharla sé ag tús na bliana

result.ponchtml: Ṫarla sé ag tús na blianaIt happened at the beginning of the year.

result.eng: I've been working in this shop for three years.
result.ga: Tá mé ag obair sa siopa seo le trí bliana

result.eng: I've been working in the same place for five years.
result.ga: Tá mé ag obair san áit chéanna le cúig bliana
result.orig: Tá mé ag obair san áit chéanna le cúig bliana
result.html: Tá mé ag obair san áit chéanna le cúig blianaI've been working in the same place for five years.

result.eng: He is almost tree years old.

result.html: Tá sé chóir a bheith trí bliana d'aoisHe is almost tree years old.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ċóir a ḃeiṫ trí bliana d'aoisHe is almost tree years old.

result.eng: You are three years older than me.
result.ga: Tá trí bliana agat orm
result.orig: Tá trí bliana agat orm
result.html: Tá trí bliana agat ormYou are three years older than me.
result.ponchtml: Tá trí bliana agat ormYou are three years older than me.

result.eng: He is six years of age.
result.ga: Tá sé sé bliana d'aois

result.html: Tá sé sé bliana d'aoisHe is six years of age.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé sé bliana d'aoisHe is six years of age.

result.eng: Pól is six years old and Nuala has two years.
result.ga: Tá Pól sé bliana d'aois agus tá dhá bhliain ag Nuala
result.orig: Tá Pól sé bliana d'aois agus tá dhá bhliain ag Nuala

result.eng: I am sixteen years old.
result.ga: Tá mé sé bliana déag d'aois
result.orig: Tá mé sé bliana déag d'aois
result.html: Tá mé sé bliana déag d'aoisI am sixteen years old.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé sé bliana déag d'aoisI am sixteen years old.

result.eng: Fifty-five years.
result.ga: Cúig bliana agus caoga
result.orig: Cúig bliana agus caoga
result.html: Cúig bliana agus caogaFifty-five years.
result.ponchtml: Cúig bliana agus caogaFifty-five years.

result.eng: She is three years older than me.

result.ponchtml: Tá sí trí bliana níos sine ná miseShe is three years older than me.

result.eng: I have one son, Stiofán, he's five years old.
result.ga: Tá mac amháin agam Stiofán tá sé cúig bliana d'aois

result.ponchtml: Tá mac aṁáin agam Stiofán tá sé cúig bliana d'aoisI have one son, Stiofán, he's five years old.

result.eng: I'm not married but I've been going out with someone for three years now.
result.ga: Níl mé pósta ach tá mé ag siúl amach le duine éigin le trí bliana anois
result.orig: Níl mé pósta ach tá mé ag siúl amach le duine éigin le trí bliana anois

result.ponchtml: Níl mé pósta aċ tá mé ag siúl amaċ le duine éigin le trí bliana anoisI'm not married but I've been going out with someone for three years now.

result.eng: We've been living in the house now for six years and we're very happy with it.
result.ga: Táimid inár gcónaí sa teach anois le sé bliana agus táimid an-sásta leis
result.orig: Táimid inár gcónaí sa teach anois le sé bliana agus táimid an-sásta leis

result.eng: Jamie was four years old, no more, no less.
result.ga: Ceithre bliana gan lá chuige nó uaidh a bhí Séimí

result.eng: He was so short of sense as a child five years younger than him.

result.eng: We depend on him for food all year round.
result.ga: Tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia bliana
result.orig: Tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia bliana
result.html: Tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia blianaWe depend on him for food all year round.
